name: developer-portfolios
description: A simple website on which you will find a list of developer portfolios from which you can be inspired
author: doxsch

scripts.postinstall: git clone --branch fix-gatsby-transformer-screenshot-fastq --filter=blob:none --no-checkout --depth 1 --sparse https://github.com/doxsch/gatsby.git gatsby && cd gatsby && git sparse-checkout init --cone && git sparse-checkout set packages/gatsby-transformer-screenshot && git checkout && cd packages/gatsby-transformer-screenshot && npm install && cd .. && cd .. && cd .. && npm i ./gatsby/packages/gatsby-transformer-screenshot/
